text:
One year after the effective date of this Chapter, and every year thereafter, the City Administrator shall prepare and submit to the Board of Supervisors a report that summarizes any waivers that have been granted pursuant to Subsection (c) of this Chapter. A copy of the Annual Report shall also be provided to the San Francisco Child Care Planning and Advisory Council and the Department of Children, Youth and Their Families. 
(Added by Ord. 1-11, File No. 101094, App. 1/6/2011)
